meanings.definition: Denoting a factor of one million (10^6).
meanings.sent1: The company made a mega profit this year.
meanings.sent2: The rocket traveled at mega speed towards the moon.
meanings.sent3: The mega sale at the store attracted a huge crowd.
meanings.sent4: His mega brain could solve any math problem in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The mega jackpot prize was enough to change their lives forever.

meanings.definition: A unit prefix in the metric system denoting a factor of one million (10^6).
meanings.sent1: The scientist used mega to represent one million in his calculations.
meanings.sent2: The computer had a storage capacity of several megabytes.
meanings.sent3: She bought a dress online that cost a mega amount of money.
meanings.sent4: The speed of light is often measured in megameters per second.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship traveled at a mega velocity through space.
